entries.name: Stirge spawner.
entries: Each round, at initiative 20 (losing all ties), the Stirge Hivemouth creates one new {@creature Stirge Bloodletter|GuildOfIcons} in its space.

entries.name: Collapsible.
entries: If the hivemouth takes 10 or more points of damage in one round, it collapses, preventing it from using the Stirge Spawner ability.

entries.name: Unstable.
entries: Anybody who tries to use this weapon without firearms proficiency must roll a D6. On a 1 or a 2, the weapon explodes, dealing {@dice 3d6} radiant damage to the wielder.

entries.name: Unstable.
entries: Anybody who tries to use this weapon without firearms proficiency must roll a D6. On a 1 or a 2, the weapon explodes, dealing {@dice 3d6} radiant damage to the wielder.

item.name: Pulse Cannon
entries: The Pulse Cannon starts with 4 charges. It does not regain charges.

As an action, you may expend any number of charges to fire a spread shot of superheated light in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 4d6} radiant damage per charge spent on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Firing the the Pulse Cannon has a X/6 chance of causing the weapon to explode, where X is the number of charges spent. The explosion deals {@damage 8d6} radiant damage to all creatures in a 20 foot radius sphere centered around the firer and destroys the Pulse Cannon.

entries.name: Unstable.
entries: Anybody who tries to use the Pulse Cannon without firearms proficiency causes the weapon to explode, dealing {@damage 8d6} radiant damage to all creatures in a 20 foot radius sphere centered around the firer and destroys the Pulse Cannon.
You have advantage on saving throws to reduce or avoid cold, fire, and lightning damage while wearing this armor.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Ansel fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Ansel's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Man's Best Friend
entries: If Ansel's Brass Defender is killed, when Ansel takes the Multiattack action, he can make an additional Megaton Fist attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ansel makes two attacks, one with the Shock Gauntlet, and then one with the Megaton Fist. If either action has not recharged, Ansel substitutes it with a Punch attack.

action.name: Shock Gauntlet [Recharge 3-6]
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d12 + 4}) lightning damage and the target must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} until the end of Ansel's next turn.

action.name: Megaton Fist [Recharge 3-6]
entries: Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from Ansel must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet away from Ansel. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

action.name: Punch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Dispel Magic (3/Day)
entries: Choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range. Any spell of 3rd level or lower on the target ends.

bonus.name: Command Defender
entries: Ansel gives one command to his Brass Defender. The Brass Defender continues to carry out that command until another is issued.

reaction.name: Hellish Rebuke (1/Day)
entries: When Ansel is damaged by a creature within 60 ft. that he can see, he points his finger, and the creature that damaged him is momentarily surrounded by hellish flames. The creature must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw. It takes (16) {@damage 3d10} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

variant.name: Villain Actions
entries: If Ansel is used as a villain, he can use his villain actions. One villain action can be taken per round, and must be taken after another creature has ended their turn. Each villain action can be taken only once per short rest, unless otherwise specified.

entries.name: Conjure Guardian.
entries: Ansel pulls his Brass Defender from a pocket dimension to an unoccupied space within 30ft. The Brass Defender acts immediately.

entries.name: The Modern Icarus.
entries: Wings of brass protrude from the mantel's back. Until the end of Ansel's next turn, Ansel has a fly speed equal to 60 ft.

entries.name: Arcane Artillery (2 uses).
entries: A sheet of iron slides back on one of Ansel's shoulders, revealing a bank of 8 crystals. Each crystal launches into the air as a Magic Missile, homing in on and striking a target of Ansel's choice within 120 ft., dealing 3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) force damage. Unlike Magic Missile, these missiles do not need line of sight.

trait.name: Vigilant
entries: The defender can't be surprised.

action.name: Force-Empowered Rend
entries: {@atk mw} +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. {@h}{@damage 1d8 + 4} force damage.

action.name: Repair (3/Day)
entries: The magical mechanisms inside the defender restore {@dice 2d8 + 4} hit points to itself or to one construct or object within 5 feet of it.

reaction.name: Deflect Attack
entries: The defender imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of one creature it can see that is within 5 feet of it, provided the attack roll is against a creature other than the defender.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The clockwork beetle queen is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The clockwork beetle queen has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The queen regains 2 ({@dice 1d4}) hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The queen makes two Bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) piercing damage and the target must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take an additional 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage.

bonus.name: Spawn
entries: The queen creates a new Scuttlebug. It appears in an unoccupied square within 5ft. of the queen.

monster.name: Scuttlebug
languages: understands Common and telepathy 100 ft. (creator only)

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The clockwork beetle is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The clockwork beetle has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) poison damage, or one-half poison damage with a successful {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw.

trait.name: Fire Absorption
entries: When the shadow takes fire damage it instead takes no damage and heals by the amount of damage that would be dealt.

trait.name: Chromatic Stealth
entries: While in dim light, red light, or darkness, the shadow can take the Hide action as a bonus action. Its stealth bonus is also improved to +7.

trait.name: Colour Weakness
entries: While in sunlight or blue light, the shadow has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

trait.name: Magical Essence
entries: {@spell Dispel magic} will instantly destroy a Shadow.

action.name: Wisdom Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) fire damage, and the target's Wisdom score is reduced by {@dice 1d4 + 1}. The target dies if this reduces its Wisdom to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.
If a non-evil humanoid dies from this attack, a new shadow rises from the corpse {@dice 1d4} hours later.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny construct. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 0 ft., up to 4 creatures in the swarm's space. {@h}17 ({@damage 5d6}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

monster.name: Mirrormetal Golem

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Fire Absorption
entries: Whenever the golem is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the fire damage dealt.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The golem makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Poison Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The golem exhales poisonous gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Berserker Rage
entries: When the Gnoll has fewer than half its hit points remaining, it can use its Multiattack action.

action.name: Multiattack (Bloodied only)
entries: The Gnoll makes two Bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

trait.name: Berserker Rage
entries: When the Gnoll has fewer than half its hit points remaining, it can use its Multiattack action.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the minion takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the minion takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum, otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Multiattack (Bloodied only)
entries: The Gnoll makes two Bite attacks.

action.name: Bite (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}2 piercing damage.

trait.name: Berserker Rage
entries: When the gnoll has fewer than half its hit points remaining, it can use its Multiattack action.

action.name: Multiattack (Bloodied only)
entries: The gnoll makes three Biting Blade attacks.

action.name: Biting Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage and the target starts bleeding for 1 minute. While bleeding, the target takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) slashing damage at the start of each of its turns.

A bleeding creature may make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the effect on a success. The effect is ended if the creature receives at least 8 hit points of healing in one turn.

bonus.name: Call To Violence
entries: The gnoll barks a guttural order to another gnoll within 30 ft. The target can use its reaction to make a single melee weapon attack.

trait.name: Berserker Rage
entries: When the Gnoll has fewer than half its hit points remaining, it can use its Multiattack action.

trait.name: Combat Archery
entries: The Gnoll does not make its Shortbow attacks at disadvantage while it is within the reach of an enemy.

action.name: Multiattack (Bloodied only)
entries: The Gnoll makes two Shortbow attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage if the target is within 10 ft.

trait.name: Berserker Rage
entries: When the Gnoll has fewer than half its hit points remaining, it can use its Multiattack action.

trait.name: Icon of Blood
entries: Gnoll within 20 ft. of the Icon of Blood can use their Multiattack actions even if they are not Bloodied.

action.name: Multiattack (Bloodied only)
entries: The Gnoll makes two Dark Impulse attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Dark Impulse
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Inspire Violence (1/Long Rest)
entries: The Gnoll briefly embodies the spirit of Yeenoghu through their Icon of Blood. All Gnoll within 20 ft. of the Icon can immediately make one Bite attack against one target within range.

bonus.name: Plant / Retrieve Icon
entries: The Gnoll can plant the Icon of Blood in the ground. While planted, the Icon of Blood can be targeted by enemy attacks. It has AC 13 and 20 hit points.
The Gnoll can retrieve a planted icon if they are within 5ft. of it.

trait.name: Berserker Rage
entries: When the Gnoll has fewer than half its hit points remaining, it can use its Multiattack action.

action.name: Multiattack (Bloodied only)
entries: The Gnoll makes two Bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Shield Interdiction
entries: When an enemy within 5 ft. of the Gnoll attacks an ally, the Gnoll interposes their shield to deflect the blow. The ally's AC becomes 19 until the end of the turn.

trait.name: Berserker Rage
entries: When the Gnoll has fewer than half its hit points remaining, it can use its Multiattack action.

trait.name: Draw A Bead
entries: If the Gnoll does not move this turn, they gain advantage on attack rolls with their Longbow

action.name: Multiattack (Bloodied only)
entries: The Gnoll makes two Longbow attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) poison damage.

action.name: Debilitating Serum (2/Long Rest)
entries: The Gnoll coats an arrow with a rare poison. Make a Longbow attack against a target. If the attack hits, the target must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be Paralysed for one minute. The target may repeat the saving throw at the end of each of their turns, ending the effect on a success.

reaction.name: Nightpowder (1/Long Rest)
entries: As a reaction when an attack hits the Gnoll, the Gnoll disappears in a puff of black smoke, laced with stars. It reappears in an unoccupied position of its choice within 20 ft and the attack misses.

trait.name: Cold Absorption
entries: When the shadow takes cold damage it instead takes no damage and heals by the amount of damage that would be dealt.

trait.name: Chromatic Stealth
entries: While in dim light, blue light, or darkness, the shadow can take the Hide action as a bonus action. Its stealth bonus is also improved to +7.

trait.name: Colour Weakness
entries: While in sunlight or red light, the shadow has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

trait.name: Magical Essence
entries: {@spell Dispel magic} will instantly destroy a Shadow.

action.name: Intelligence Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) fire damage, and the target's Intelligence score is reduced by {@dice 1d4 + 1}. The target dies if this reduces its Intelligence to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.
If a non-evil humanoid dies from this attack, a new shadow rises from the corpse {@dice 1d4} hours later.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the minion takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the minion takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum, otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Bloodsucker
entries: When a creature loses hit points due to blood loss caused by a Stirge, its hit point maximum is reduced by half the total hit point loss this turn. A creature drained in this way recovers their hit point maximum after a long rest.

trait.name: Malevolent Grasp
entries: While the Stirge is attached to a creature, attacks against it are at disadvantage.

action.name: Blood Drain (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, one creature. {@h}1 piercing damage, and the Stirge attaches to the target. While attached, the Stirge doesn't attack. Instead, at the start of each of the Stirge's turns, the target loses 1 hit point due to blood loss. A creature, including the target, can use its action to detach the Stirge.

trait.name: Bloodsucker
entries: When a creature loses hit points due to blood loss caused by a Stirge, its hit point maximum is reduced by half the hit points lost. A creature drained in this way recovers their hit point maximum after a long rest.

trait.name: Malevolent Grasp
entries: While the Stirge is attached to a creature, attacks against it are at disadvantage.

action.name: Blood Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage, and the Stirge attaches to the target. While attached, the Stirge doesn't attack. Instead, at the start of each of the Stirge's turns, the target loses 5 hit points due to blood loss. A creature, including the target, can use its action to detach the Stirge.

trait.name: Bloodsucker
entries: When a creature loses hit points due to blood loss caused by a Stirge, its hit point maximum is reduced by half the hit points lost. A creature drained in this way recovers their hit point maximum after a long rest.

trait.name: Malevolent Grasp
entries: While the Stirge is attached to a creature, attacks against it are at disadvantage.

action.name: Blood Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, and the Stirge attaches to the target. While attached, the Stirge doesn't attack. Instead, at the start of each of the Stirge's turns, the target loses 10 hit points due to blood loss. A creature, including the target, can use its action to detach the Stirge.

trait.name: Bloodsucker
entries: When a creature loses hit points due to blood loss caused by a Stirge, its hit point maximum is reduced by half the hit points lost. A creature drained in this way recovers their hit point maximum after a long rest.

trait.name: Lacerator
entries: When the Stirge deals damage to a creature using its Razorwing attack, the target loses two hit points due to blood loss for each Stirge attached to the creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Stirge makes three razorwing attacks.

action.name: Razorwing
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Polymer Armour
entries: The starborn has advantage on saving throws to reduce or avoid cold, fire, and lightning damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The starborn makes two Pulse Musket attacks.

action.name: Storm Gauntlet
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d6 + 1}) thunder damage. Another enemy within 10 ft. takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Pulse Musket
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) radiant damage.

bonus.name: Warpstep
entries: The starborn fades through a cloak of stars, appearing in an unoccupied space it can see within 20 ft.

trait.name: Polymer Armour
entries: The starborn has advantage on saving throws to reduce or avoid cold, fire, and lightning damage.

action.name: Storm Gauntlet
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d6 + 1}) thunder damage. Another enemy within 10 ft. takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Pulse Cannon
entries: The starborn fires a spread shot of superheated light in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Warpstep
entries: The starborn fades through a cloak of stars, appearing in an unoccupied space it can see within 20 ft.

trait.name: Polymer Armour
entries: The starborn has advantage on saving throws to reduce or avoid cold, fire, and lightning damage.

action.name: Pulse Arquebus
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 60/300 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3}) radiant damage.

action.name: Overwatch
entries: The starborn readies a shot for the right moment. When a creature they can see makes an attack or moves, they can use their reaction to make a Pulse Arquebus attack with advantage.

bonus.name: Warpstep
entries: The starborn fades through a cloak of stars, appearing in an unoccupied space it can see within 20 ft.

reaction.name: Overwatch Shot
entries: The starborn makes a Pulse Arquebus attack with advantage. The starborn can only use this if they used the Overwatch action on their last turn.

trait.name: Polymer Armour
entries: The starborn has advantage on saving throws to reduce or avoid cold, fire, and lightning damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The starborn makes two Storm Gauntlet attacks.

action.name: Storm Gauntlet
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) thunder damage. Another enemy within 10 ft. takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) lightning damage.

bonus.name: Warpstep
entries: The starborn fades through a cloak of stars, appearing in an unoccupied space it can see within 20 ft.
